name: Fwoggy
description:
Fwoggy is a short rage-inducing game, that requires players to use Coots to push a ball of yarn through an icy castle to reach the end and receive a present from QT. The game's difficulty is off the charts, with slippery terrain, making it hard to control Coots and the yarn.

While the game's frustrating gameplay can be maddening, it also offers a unique and challenging experience. The graphics and sound effects are simple yet effective, adding to the game's overall charm.

Fwoggy is a game that will test your patience and skills, but will also provide a sense of accomplishment when you finally reach your goal.

Music by Teknoaxe

secret tip: keep pressing the jump button to charge your jump
